name: DRIFT AND SMASH
description:
This game is about the fun of bumping into huge piles of tires and barrels while drifting.

Achieve ranks & complete different levels:
• Track day
• Survival
• Soccer
• Golf
• Hockey
• Explode bot cars in superlevels

Next gen game collision physics, smashing cars, tons of tuning and upgrades. And even more coming in the future updates!

------------------
Additional in-app purchases:
• In-app currency
• Premium cars
• Tuning packs with a fire spitting exhaust
• Rims paint
• Skipping a level
